medium: Lithographs on hand-made paper in linen portfolio
title: Study for "July Among Sparrows", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: Signed, dated, numbered, chop mark, annotated in r LC: [NA 1990]; LR: [W.P.]
description: Man in full view, wearing a wide rimmed hat and long pants; he faces forward in a chair; his body turned slightly; a cigarette in his PR hand; three sparrows at his feet; the words \"July Among Sparrows\" inscribed, UC
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
